entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
